au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=20m_L2=1.3m__apxhs_GISANS
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(510,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to ga driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to horizontal slit sics.drive('apx', 0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 94) sics.set('beamcenterz', 97)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(210)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(263)
